**Title:** Installation, Removal and Retrofit Emergency and Safety Equipment in Police Vehicles, Saskatchewan
**Reference Number:** cb-6993-78305627
**Publication Date:** July 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 9, 2023, 4:00 PM Eastern Time

**Background:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the supply of installation, removal, and retrofit of emergency and safety equipment in police vehicles. This contract will cover multiple vehicles and equipment types, with authorized RCMP installation information to be provided upon contract award.

** tender Conditions**

* Tenderers are invited to submit proposals electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS).
* All responsive bids will be ranked from lowest to highest priced.
* A minimum of one (1) contract to a maximum of two (2) may result from the solicitation.

**Notice**

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* All documentation is available on GETS.
* Indigenous Procurement:
The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.
Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business.
A profile in the IBD can allow you to compete for federal government contracts that are set aside for Indigenous businesses through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.
